component.name: save_feed_url
component.script:
sub init() print "initializing save_feed_url" m.top.functionName = "saveurl" end sub
' ****************************************
sub saveurl()
print "GLOBAL FEEDURL to SAVE to Registry";m.global.feedurl reg = CreateObject("roRegistrySection", "profile") reg.Write("primaryfeed", m.global.feedurl) reg.Flush() End sub
